newsitem.title: USA: Texas/w Okla feedlot cattle sales slow at $69 - USDA.
newsitem.headline: Texas/w Okla feedlot cattle sales slow at $69 - USDA.

text.p: Trade was very slow in the panhandle area on Thursday, USDA said. Limited test slaughter steers and heifers steady. Feedlots reporting light to moderate inquiry from buyers.

Sales reported on 200 slaughter steers and 700 heifers; 113,800 head confirmed for the week to date which includes 20,900 formulate cattle and 800 previously contracted cattle to be shipped this week and 300 head or 8 loads of CME delivery cattle.
Note - all cattle prices based on net weights FOB the feedlot after a 4 percent shrink.
Slaughter Steers - Select and Choice 2-3 1100-1250 lbs 69.00.
Slaughter Heifers - Select and Choice 2-3 1000-1150 lbs 69.00.
Wk to date - 113,800 Week Ago - 109,200 Year Ago - 62,400
